Token.Abstract: Internal use only. Writes a KTTilemap object to a file in TMX format. The resulting TMX can be opened in Tiled Map Editor or other tools/engines that support the TMX format.
Writes a KTTilemap object hierarchy to a file in TMX format.

Parameter.Name: file
Parameter.Abstract: The full path to a file.

Parameter.Name: tilemap
Parameter.Abstract: The KTTilemap object hierarchy to write.
